snippet.title: Wolf Tails Trailer (2018 visual novel)
snippet.description:
"Wolf Tails" is a visual novel where you take care of two wolf girls. The game features two romance options, a chooseable protagonist gender, and animated intros for Naso4's gorgeously illustrated CG scenes. 

Link: http://store.steampowered.com/app/822930/Wolf_Tails/
